name: Meshes

values.name: icosphere
values.comment: A sphere mesh made by subdiving an icosahedron.

values.name: subdivide
values.comment:
Divide each triangle into four triangles.

The subdivision is performed `n` times.
values.type: Int -> List ( Math.Vector3.Vec3, Math.Vector3.Vec3, Math.Vector3.Vec3 ) -> List ( Math.Vector3.Vec3, Math.Vector3.Vec3, Math.Vector3.Vec3 )
